description: This file defines a React functional component called Sidebar which renders a navigational sidebar with toggle capability, icon, and label display based on the collapsed state. It imports React, NavLink from react-router-dom, some route definitions, and a CSS stylesheet. The component uses props for collapsing behavior and toggling, and maps over route data to generate navigation links with active highlighting.

methods.name: Sidebar({ collapsed = false, onToggle })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a sidebar with navigation links and collapsible functionality.

ctags.name: Sidebar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Sidebar({ collapsed = false, onToggle }) {$/
